# [Interview #1126: Barnes & Noble (Newnan), Entry #34](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1126#34)

#### Question

Who is Nazh?

#### Brandon Sanderson

He is kind of like a cosmere special agent, who gathers things for the person who is writing the Ars Arcanum.
